stories.title: Dust Motes
stories.body: At 7:12 the light turned the dust into galaxies, and nobody filed a claim.
micro: A window invents an economy of light.
Auditors arrive; photons refuse to comply.

stories.title: Cold Start
stories.body: The kettle remembers yesterday’s song; the algorithm forgets on purpose.
